name: Harus
description:
History

Harus' peace was compromised when the mighty blue crystal was stolen from the Duaris kingdom. Princess Masumi lost her life, but fortunately, with the privilege of having her name written on the crystal, she could revive in her realm of naturalness, just like the ancestral princesses. But something very wrong happened; Masumi was reborn on planet earth, how was that possible ?!
